tr.t-if: data.dimension_visible and (data.deviation_length_width_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or (data.deviation_length_width_nabl == 'fail' or eln.sample_id.scope != 'nabl') and not nabl)
data.deviation_thickness_visible and (data.deviation_thickness_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or (data.deviation_thickness_nabl == 'fail' or eln.sample_id.scope != 'nabl') and not nabl)
data.straightness_visible and (data.deviation_straightness_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or (data.deviation_straightness_nabl == 'fail' or eln.sample_id.scope != 'nabl') and not nabl)
data.rectangularity_visible and (data.deviation_rectangularity_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or (data.deviation_rectangularity_nabl == 'fail' or eln.sample_id.scope != 'nabl') and not nabl)
data.centre_curvature_visible and (data.deviation_centre_curvature_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or (data.deviation_centre_curvature_nabl == 'fail' or eln.sample_id.scope != 'nabl') and not nabl)
data.edge_curvature_visible and (data.deviation_edge_curvature_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or (data.deviation_edge_curvature_nabl == 'fail' or eln.sample_id.scope != 'nabl') and not nabl)
data.warpage_visible and (data.deviation_warpage_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or (data.deviation_warpage_nabl == 'fail' or eln.sample_id.scope != 'nabl') and not nabl)
data.water_bulk_visible and (data.average_water_bulk_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or (data.average_water_bulk_nabl == 'fail' or eln.sample_id.scope != 'nabl') and not nabl)
data.water_bulk_visible and (data.individual_water_bulk_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or (data.individual_water_bulk_nabl == 'fail' or eln.sample_id.scope != 'nabl') and not nabl)
data.water_bulk_visible and (data.bulk_density_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or (data.bulk_density_nabl == 'fail' or eln.sample_id.scope != 'nabl') and not nabl)
data.modulus_visible and (data.average_modulus_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or (data.average_modulus_nabl == 'fail' or eln.sample_id.scope != 'nabl') and not nabl)
data.modulus_visible and (data.individual_modulus_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or (data.individual_modulus_nabl == 'fail' or eln.sample_id.scope != 'nabl') and not nabl)
data.modulus_visible and (data.breaking_strenght_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or (data.breaking_strenght_nabl == 'fail' or eln.sample_id.scope != 'nabl') and not nabl)
